description:
godoc: add util package, add start of vfs package

Move some code out of cmd/godoc.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

It's kinda related, but probably not what that bug is about.


On 17 July 2013 15:09, Dave Cheney <dave@cheney.net> wrote:

> Update issue 5636 ?
>
> On Wed, Jul 17, 2013 at 2:44 PM,  <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:

> > https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=664d19c0d47d&repo=tools ***
> >
> >
> > godoc: add util package, add start of vfs package
> >
> > Move some code out of cmd/godoc.
> >
> > R=golang-dev, adg
> > CC=golang-dev
> > https://codereview.appspot.com/11413043
> >
> >

> > https://codereview.appspot.com/11413043/

R=golang-dev, adg

Update issue 5636 ?
